name: Robber 2D
description:
Find keys and use them to open the Diamond Safes. Destroy enemies and collect coins for extra score

Game Modes
  • Play as Tank
  • Play as Thief
Controls
  • Movement  🠚 Arrows
  • Drink Potion 🠚 D
  • Shoot 🠚 S
  • Jump 🠚 Space
Save Score
  • Scores will be saved on C-drive in the folder "Robber2D"
